results.name: A Game with Zombies and Stuff

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 - 64 bits *
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 Compatible
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 - 64 bits *
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce 760 or AMD HD 8800 or higher with 4GB of RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 Compatible
